message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115.  I think it's a great deal and I'm confident it will be valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me at this price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $105 is a fair offer, I'm aiming for something closer to $110. Would that work for you?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. Can you meet me at this price?
